title: India : mobile activities as of January 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
Response Visit a social network has the highest Share of respondents and Look for product information has the lowest Share of respondents.
The highest Response Visit a social network has 17.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Look for product information.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 21.0 is found at Response Visit a social network and the minimum is found at Look for product information where Response is 4.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
Response Visit a social network has the highest Share of respondents and Look for product information has the lowest Share of respondents.
The highest Response Visit a social network has 17.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Look for product information.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 21.0 is found at Response Visit a social network and the minimum is found at Look for product information where Response is 4.0.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 17.0.
The Response Visit a social network has the highest Share of respondents, followed by Watch videos, and Use a search engine. Down to the Response Look for product information which is the lowest.
Response Look for product information, and Play games have the same Share of respondents.
The Response Visit a social network has 1.75 times more Share of respondents than average.
